incidents.title: Weather disruption near Zernez Scuol-Tarasp, station
incidents.subtitle: Requesting all the trains that are supposed to stop at Platform 4 to use Platform 5 instead.
incidents.description: Limited train service between Giubiasco and Castione-Arbedo are subject to restrictions. This is due to a defect in the overhead line. The restriction lasts at least until 10:39. Lines EC, IC2, IC21, IR26, IR46 and S10 are affected. Allow for delays.
incidents.note: No liability will be accepted for the details or services provided or for adherence to timetables. Please check for possible changes shortly before departure

incidents.title: Landslide near Interlaken Ost
incidents.subtitle: Severe weather conditions near Zernez and Scuol-Tarasp stations have disrupted train services. Authorities are working to assess the damage and resume normal operations as soon as possible
